SEARCH
Package com.dua3.meja.model

Class AbstractSheet<S extends AbstractSheet<S,R,C>,R extends AbstractRow<S,R,C>,C extends AbstractCell<S,R,C>>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.model.AbstractSheet<S,R,C>
Type Parameters:
S - the concrete type of Sheet (self-referential type parameter), extending AbstractSheet
R - the concrete type of Row that this sheet contains, extending AbstractRow
C - the concrete type of Cell that this sheet contains, extending AbstractCell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sheet, Iterable<Row>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericSheet, PoiSheet
public abstract class AbstractSheet<S extends AbstractSheet<S,R,C>,R extends AbstractRow<S,R,C>,C extends AbstractCell<S,R,C>> extends Object implements Sheet
The AbstractSheet class represents the abstract base class for a sheet in a spreadsheet. It provides common functionality for working with sheets and is designed to be extended by specific implementations for different spreadsheet formats.

    • unsubscribe

      public void unsubscribe(Flow.Subscriber<SheetEvent> subscriber)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Unsubscribe from sheet events.

      If the given subscriber is currently subscribed to this sheet's event stream, it will be deregistered and will no longer receive events. If the subscriber is not registered, this method does nothing.

      Idempotent and thread-safe.

      Specified by:
      unsubscribe in interface Sheet
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the previously registered subscriber to remove

    • activeCellChanged

      protected void activeCellChanged(@Nullable Cell old, @Nullable Cell arg)
      Notifies subscribers that the active cell in the sheet has changed. This method is called internally when there is a change in the active cell of the sheet. Subscribers can listen to this event and perform any necessary actions or updates.
      Parameters:
      old - the previously active cell
      arg - the new active cell

    • readLock

      public com.dua3.utility.concurrent.AutoLock readLock(String name)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Acquires a read lock for thread-safe access to the sheet. Multiple threads can hold read locks simultaneously, but a read lock cannot be acquired while a write lock is held. The lock is automatically released when the returned AutoLock is closed.

      Example usage with try-with-resources: 

      
 try (var lock = sheet.readLock("MyOperation")) {
     // Read operations here...
     Cell cell = sheet.getCell(0, 0);
 }
      Specified by:
      readLock in interface Sheet
      Parameters:
      name - a descriptive name for the lock, used for debugging and monitoring. Should indicate the operation or component acquiring the lock.
      Returns:
      an AutoLock that will automatically release the read lock when closed
      See Also:
      • Sheet.writeLock(String)
      • AutoLock

    • writeLock

      public com.dua3.utility.concurrent.AutoLock writeLock(String name)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Acquires an exclusive write lock for thread-safe modifications to the sheet. Only one thread can hold a write lock at a time, and no read locks can be held while a write lock is active. The lock is automatically released when the returned AutoLock is closed.

      Example usage with try-with-resources: 

      
 try (var lock = sheet.writeLock("UpdateOperation")) {
     // Modification operations here...
     sheet.getCell(0, 0).setValue("New Value");
     sheet.addMergedRegion(region);
 }

      Note: Write locks should be held for the shortest time possible as they block all other threads from reading or writing.

      Specified by:
      writeLock in interface Sheet
      Parameters:
      name - a descriptive name for the lock, used for debugging and monitoring. Should indicate the operation or component acquiring the lock.
      Returns:
      an AutoLock that will automatically release the write lock when closed
      See Also:
      • Sheet.readLock(String)
      • AutoLock

    • addMergedRegion

      public void addMergedRegion(RectangularRegion cells)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Creates a new merged region in the sheet. A merged region is a rectangular area of cells that acts as a single cell. The content and style of the top-left cell in the region becomes the content and style for the entire merged region.
      Specified by:
      addMergedRegion in interface Sheet
      Parameters:
      cells - the rectangular region of cells to be merged
      See Also:
      • Sheet.getMergedRegions()
      • Sheet.getMergedRegion(int, int)

    • getMergedRegions

      public List<RectangularRegion> getMergedRegions()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Returns a list of all merged regions in this sheet. A merged region is a rectangular area of cells that acts as a single cell. The list is unmodifiable and represents a snapshot of the current state.
      Specified by:
      getMergedRegions in interface Sheet
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of all merged regions in this sheet
      See Also:
      • Sheet.addMergedRegion(RectangularRegion)
      • Sheet.getMergedRegion(int, int)

    • getMergedRegion

      public Optional<RectangularRegion> getMergedRegion(int rowIndex, int colIndex)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Returns the merged region that contains the cell at the specified position.
      Specified by:
      getMergedRegion in interface Sheet
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the row index (0-based)
      colIndex - the column index (0-based)
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the merged region, or empty if the cell is not part of any merged region
      See Also:
      • Sheet.getMergedRegions()

    • getCurrentCell

      public final Cell getCurrentCell()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Get the current cell in the sheet. The current cell represents the active or focused cell in the sheet, which is typically used for navigation and editing operations.

      If no active cell has been set, the cell at position "A1" is returned

      Specified by:
      getCurrentCell in interface Sheet
      Returns:
      the current cell
      See Also:
      • Sheet.setCurrentCell(Cell)
      • Sheet.setCurrentCell(int, int)

    • autoSizeColumn

      public final void autoSizeColumn(int colIndex)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Adjusts the size of the column to its contents.

      The computed width is measured in typographical points (1/72 inch) and applied via Sheet.setColumnWidth(int, float).

      Specified by:
      autoSizeColumn in interface Sheet
      Parameters:
      colIndex - the column to resize (0-based index)

    • autoSizeColumns

      public final void autoSizeColumns()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Adjusts the size of all columns.

      The computed widths are measured in typographical points (1/72 inch) and applied via Sheet.setColumnWidth(int, float).

      Specified by:
      autoSizeColumns in interface Sheet
